message.body: So what is cool in San Diego? Heading there for a couple days...
Stone brewing! Balboa Park (tea garden, museums) Alesmith Green flash brewing
There is also a toronado that is very different (attitude wise and decor wise)
Ahhh awesome! At stone right this second, actually! Balboa park & Torrey pines are on the list, maybe we'll check out the toronado tonight, although I am still miffed at them after last year
Thank you for the list! Wish me luck with the self realization...does it work??
Maybe? Either way, the gardens are pretty nice and near the beach
Sold! Thanks dude. What are you doing tonight?
Some friends are coming over for dinner.
Today started off really poorly. I woke up crying
But when I got to work I leveled off

Well, I'm glad it leveled off and I hope dinner's good! I feel like it's gonna be a lot of crying to go through (seriously, I wish I could take some and do it for you, like emotional paperwork or leaf raking or something) and I just hope it feels manageable most of the time, you know?
It is everyday but usually in the evening before bed. After my friends leave

:( I believe it and I am so sorry. I guess that's the thing - there's going to be a whole big lot of hurt and bad feelings, and you've gotta be able to feel them and engage with them, but hopefully without feeling overwhelmed/adrift. Like you have a life preserver.
